title: Best Tutors
description: The Quran Courses  Academy has professional teachers who can communicate in Arabic and English fluently,  making sure that communication and learning is effective.

title: Interactive Classes
description: The Quran Courses Academy uses the latest software such as video streaming, whiteboard, screen sharing and multi-channel audio to make Quran Interactive learning experience.

title: Flexible Timings
description: The courses are scheduled according to the convenience of the students, so that learning the Quran can easily be adjusted according to their daily routine without any hassle.

title: Any Time & Device
description: For your convenience, you can now learn Quran Everywhere, at any time, on any device.Take your Quran class on PC, iPhone or any others Android device at your convenience.

title: Learn Quran
description: Learn Quran with The Quran Courses Academy. We have now designed a series of Quranic Courses for kids and adults to such as Quran Memorization and Quran Recitation.

title: Learn Arabic
description: Quran Courses will teach you how to communicate in Arabic and have a fluent speech. You can also learn Arabic numbers, conjugate Arabic verbs and Arabic grammar as well.

title: Learn Tajweed
description: Learn the Holy Quran with Tajweed rules online with qualified and expert tutors from Bangladesh to recite the Quran properly.

title: Quran For kids
description: Teaching at a young age is like carving on Stone.This means that when you learn something at a young age,you will probably remember it for life.especially Quran for kids course.
